alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:42PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...An outflow and dust from a strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Churchill County through 530 PM PDT... At 439 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow from a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Stillwater, or 11 miles southeast of Fallon, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and blowing dust reducing visibility below 2 miles. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may reduce visibility along US-50 and US-95, in addition to throughout Fallon, Salt Wells, and Stillwater. Locations impacted include... Fallon Station and Junction U.S 95 And NV 120 (Pasture Rd). MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
